item.title: Add MathJax v3 Support to Jekyll
item.description: I was using Mathjax v2 for a while and I heard v3 perform significantly better than v2. Many great tutorials explains explains how to add Mathjax support to Jekyll websites.

item.title: How to Put Papers on ArXiv
item.description: I was recently trying to put my research paper draft on ArXiv. I thought it would be as simple as submitting the pdf file, which should take approximately less than ten minutes.
